page.title: 11RECREATION
page.content: The main recreation in the area is horse riding and many people outside thearea keep horses here. RIDING SCHOOL-KESTON COURT A D.I.Y Livery Yard owned by Mrs Greta Bronson and her two daughters. They have 16-20 stables. Some horses are stab, others are feild liveries. There can be up to 28 horses. NASH FARM Mr and Mrs Redden live in longfield Cottage which belongs to Nach Farm. There are 2 paddocks and 6 large fields.Mr Redden also drives ponies in gigs. SCOUTS The Bromley District own a six acre site known as Wilberforce Scout Camp.It compises of activity and adventure playgrounds, camping facilities and a chaple. It is used every weekend by Scouts, Clubs, Guides or other Youth
